abstract: Week 5 of our contest ran during the Republican convention, and many of the 807 entries reflected that. Read the work of our winner, Gabe S., who wrote about junk food and government subsidies, then see what else teenagers around the world were thinking about during one hot week in July.

headline.main: Summer Reading Contest Winner, Week 5 | On ‘How the Government Supports Your Junk Food Habit’
